items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop por contribuir com o projeto de tradução do Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team for contributing to the Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop translation project.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team für die Mitarbeit am Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop Übersetzungsprojekt.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team per aver contribuito al progetto di traduzione per Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop翻訳プロジェクトに貢献した者に与えられる賞。
items.description_portuguese: Atribuído pela equipa do Reactive Drop por contribuições no projeto de tradução do Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop за внесение вклада в проект перевода Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_schinese: 由ReactiveDrop制作组，授予给为 《异形丛生：活性衰退》（简体中文）翻译做出贡献的译者。

items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop por contribuir para o código que sustenta o Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team for contributing to the code that powers Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team für die Mitarbeit am Code, der Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop antreibt.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team per aver contribuito con il codice di Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、Alien Swarm: Reactive Dropのコードを改善するのに貢献した者に与えられる賞。
items.description_portuguese: Atribuído pela equipa do Reactive Drop por contribuições para o código que sustenta o Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop за внесение вклада в код, на котором работает Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_schinese: 由 Reactive Drop 团队为推进《异形丛生：活性衰退》的代码做出贡献而授予。

items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop aos autores dos mapas de alta qualidade.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team to authors of high-quality maps.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team an Autoren von hochwertigen Karten.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team agli autori di mappe di alta qualità.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、クオリティの高いマップの製作者に与えられる賞。
items.description_portuguese: Atribuído pela equipa do Reactive Drop aos autores de mapas de alta qualidade.
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop авторам высококачественных карт.
items.description_schinese: 由 Reactive Drop 团队授予高质量地图的作者。

items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop aos autores dos desafios de alta qualidade.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team to authors of high-quality challenges.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team an Autoren von hochwertigen Herausforderungen.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team agli autori di sfide di alta qualità.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、クオリティの高いチャレンジモードの製作者に与えられる賞。
items.description_portuguese: Atribuído pela equipa do Reactive Drop aos autores de desafios de alta qualidade.
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop авторам высококачественных испытаний.
items.description_schinese: 由 Reactive Drop 团队授予高质量挑战的作者。

items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop aos autores dos Guias da Steam de alta qualidade.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team to authors of high-quality Steam guides.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team an Autoren von hochwertigen Steam-Guides.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team agli autori delle Guide di Steam di alta qualità.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、クオリティの高いSteamガイドの製作者に与えられる賞。
items.description_portuguese: Atribuído pela equipa do Reactive Drop aos autores de Guias Steam de alta qualidade.
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop авторам высококачественных руководств в Steam.
items.description_schinese: 由 Reactive Drop 团队授予高质量 Steam 指南的作者。

items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop por contribuir com a arte usada em Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team for contributing art that is used in Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team für den Beitrag zur Kunst, die in Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop verwendet wird.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team per aver contribuito all'arte che viene utilizzata in Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop内で使われる画像の作成に貢献した者に与えられる賞。
items.description_portuguese: Atribuído pela equipa do Reactive Drop por contribuições para a arte usada no Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop за участие в создании иллюстрации, использованной в игре Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_schinese: 由 Reactive Drop 团队为贡献了 《异形丛生：活性衰退》中使用的美术作品而授予。

items.description_brazilian: Concedido pela equipe Reactive Drop pelos relatórios de bugs de alta qualidade do Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_english: Awarded by Reactive Drop Team for high quality bug reports in Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_german: Verliehen vom Reactive Drop Team für hochqualitative Fehlerberichte in Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_italian: Conferita dal Reactive Drop Team per aver effettuato segnalazioni di alta qualità di bug in Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_japanese: Reactive Drop Teamにより、Alien Swarm: Reactive Dropの重要なバグを報告した者に与えられる賞。
items.description_russian: Выдаётся командой Reactive Drop за высококачественные сообщения об ошибках в игре Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop.
items.description_schinese: 因《异形丛生：活性衰退》中的高质量bug反馈而被 Reactive Drop 团队授予。
